body_html:
+1, import torch crashes jupyter notebook kernel, but works fine in plain python
EDIT:
I fixed this issue by downgrading my cuDNN version from 7 to 6.
EDIT2:
Found another weird way to get it to work.

import tensorflow as tf
import torch

seems to work. However, remove the tensorflow import line and it crashes the kernel.

body:
+1, `import torch` crashes jupyter notebook kernel, but works fine in plain python
EDIT:
I fixed this issue by downgrading my cuDNN version from 7 to 6.
EDIT2:
Found another weird way to get it to work.
```
import tensorflow as tf
import torch
```
seems to work. However, remove the tensorflow import line and it crashes the kernel.
